title: Workday Scheduler
description: A simple calendar application that allows a user to save events for each hour of the day. It runs in the browser and feature dynamically updated HTML and CSS powered by jQuery.

title: Weather Dashboard
description: A web-based dashboard built to show the current weather in a city of choice and the upcoming five (5) day forecast for that city.

title: Friend-Finder
description: A web application will help the user to find the pet to adopt.

title: Employee Tracker
description: A CLI application for managing a company's employees tracker using node, inquirer, and MySQL.

title: Studdy Buddy
description: Study Buddy is an app that allows a signed-in user to view their notes and upcoming study sessions from their dashboard

title: Garyphernelia
description: Garyphenalia is the virtual online store where customers can browse the category and select the products of interest.
